name: Tandoori Station
address: Calle de José Ortega y Gasset, 89- 91, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review: Lets start with - you need reservation. If u do not have one, you will need to wait till 11:30 or so to get in. This place serves individulized Indian food,.... Very good Indian food and service  in a lovely little restaurant.  Pretty expensive which is factored in my rating. We enjoyed our chicken tikka masala and.... Great food and service. As spicy as you want it. Always worth a visit if you can get a reservation..

name: La Tasqueria
address: Calle Duque de Sesto, 48, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review: This is definitely my favorite restaurant in Madrid, they are wild enough to make anything into best food, and the sauces they make are so creative ! Every.... Like Brad M., my boyfriend and I also decided to make this our last meal in Spain.  After two weeks roaming around this lovely country, we decided to end.... To our surprise we were able to get last-minute reservations to this place on a Friday night for our last dinner in Spain.  We wanted to make sure it was....

name: Cañadío
address: Calle del Conde de Peñalver, 86, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review:
A gem in the non touristic neighborhood!

On my last day during a 3 week vacation to Spain, found this splendid restaurant near my hotel. After a day trip.... Very nice outdoor space friendly staff ask for English menu as no one spoke great English. Fresh anchovies are the best and they say they have the best.... SUMMARY: Eat here. You won't regret it. Downstairs tapas and drinks. Upstairs - upscale dining. Prepare to pay appropriately. 

FOOD: 5 stars - MUST EATS -....

name: La Castela
address: Calle del Dr. Castelo, 22, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review:
First dinner in Madrid.

Looks small from the street entrance but there are dining tables in the rear of the bar.

We walked in at 10pm (prime dinner time).... Definitely the best tapas restaurant we visited this week.  Service was great with very friendly staff happy to help us with menu.  Food was really good..... Excellent old  Madrid classic. Well known and loved by Madrid connoisseurs; and a celebrities spot since Michell Obama dinned here. The food is consistently....

name: Goiko Grill
address: Calle Conde de Peñalver, 41, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review: Terrible.  They served raw burgers, not rare, blue.  After taking them back to our hotel and figuring out the quality issue, we returned to fix the error,.... Muy buenas hamburguesas. De las mejores que he comido en estos años. La carne es muy buena, las patatas increíbles (muchos restaurantes las dejan un poco.... Mac and cheese balls were unreal, the burger was great as well however i asked for well done and found the burger to be very pink..

name: Docamar
address: Calle de Alcalá, 337, 28027 Madrid, Spain
review: Great place for tapas and drinks even if you don't drink alcohol. Helpful staff, they are open late too. The homies and I walked around that place in the.... It took me forever to find this place. Granted I was working off screenshots of Google Maps because I couldn't get data on my phone, and I tend to get lost..... The service is the best I have had in a LONG time.  Friendly, talkative, honest suggestions and so on. They brought us free snacks to taste, multiple....

name: La Cevicuchería
address: Calle Téllez, 20, 28007 Madrid, Spain
review: We are visiting from the USA. This restaurant is by far one of the most exceptional restaurants!  The ceviche is fresh with a bounty of flavor. Our waitress.... Really good taste!! It is the best ceviche  I've ever eaten, although the quantity is low considering the price of the dish.. If you like ceviche and Peruvian food this place is a new hidden gem. Its been open now for 2 months and packed. The food quality is top, and decoration is....

name: O'Grelo
address: Calle de Menorca, 39, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review: We found this restaurant by luck and we end up loving the place. The service was amazing, very nice and helpful. We didn't have a reference on what to order.... Last night in Madrid and last night of our 1 week trip. We happened to pass this place on our way to another restaurant and the fresh seafood on the window.... Excellent food, especially the callo and pulpo. Wonderful service. Friendly and patient waiters. Place was packed with locals.  One of our best meals.....

name: El Gran Barril
address: Calle de Goya, 107, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review:
For seafood lovers, El Gran Barril is a place to schedule in your foodie agenda while in Madrid.  

Located near the Goya station, it is easy to get to..... Food was great. It's a block away from our hotel . Service was good. Our waiter was attentive but had a little trouble understanding us, so we got shrimp.... All the dishes were prepared very well.
Contemporary and blight ambiance and well trained staff, very professional and helpful! 
Plus quality wine listings.....

name: Purnima
address: Calle de Goya, 110, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review:
Lovely decor,  good service and flavorful fresh food .  We had ordered vegetarian dishes and all were delicious .  Enjoyed the vermouth as well .  We had.... We made an online reservation. The food is very good and the service is acceptable. Decor is acceptable. I was happy to hear Bollywood music after a long.... So the stars are for its to the point service where they didn't leave us stranded. 
We never ate at this restaurant as it was under renovation. They picked....

name: Carlos Tartiere
address: Calle de Menorca, 35, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review: The best fabada in Madrid? Probably not. But sublime anyway. The atmosphere is great, and the cider is really good. Be prepared, the cider is funky by.... Excellent food! Incredible service! We were treated with free chorizo pies, free pumpkin soup, free postre chupitos, amazing atmosphere! I will definitely....

name: La Montería
address: Calle de Lope de Rueda, 35, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review:
Decided to try based on yelp reviews and interesting menu. We started with appetizers: Gambas (shrimp) and mushrooms with truffle. I had monkfish, my.... I adored being here while going out on Saturday night in Madrid.
What a wonderful place to start with the name: the city I grew up in Colombia, S.A.
Staff.... Had a wonderful dinner there last night (Friday). I arrived about 7:30, hoping to get a seat before the crowd got there. I'm glad I did. When I walked in,....

name: Tablao Flamenco La Quimera
address: Calle Sancho Dávila, 34, 28028 Madrid, Spain
review: Wonderful experience.  Very intimate place with excellent show enjoyed it immensely.  Performance is about an hour.  So glad we decided to visit.. A fantastic and intimate experience and venue a bit outside central Madrid, Tablao features incredibly intense flamenco performers who are at the peak of.... I'm so glad a friend recommended this spot to me. The location is a little on the outskirts of the main area of tourists but it's still easy to get to by....

name: El Rincon de Jaén
address: Calle de Don Ramón de la Cruz, 88, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review:
4 Americans walk into a bar...

We were in Madrid on holiday and one of the neighbors at our Airbnb recommended this little gem nearby. From the outside, it.... The tapas keep coming as long as you have a drink in front of you. It's a very small place but clean and the service is very good.. An excellent place to get cramped and loud with your buddies. It's two places on the corner of each other. Usually hard to find sit down spots, just talk to....

name: La Mordida
address: Calle de Pío Baroja, 9, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review: Boy the Yelp reviews on this restaurant was spot on!  We wanted Mexican food so bad!  We discovered that this restaurant wasn't close and that we had to.... yes yes yes praise the people of madrid. this is the best place. the nachos and fajitas were incredible. look no further, come here for the best meal ever..... This is some of the BEST Mexican food. I'm from the South Western United States and would consider myself a Mexican food connoisseur and this is atop my....

name: Punto MX
address: Calle del General Pardiñas, 40, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review:
We had a really unique experience, no menu per se, but a chef flown in from a small town in Mexico was in residence for a week or so and had a full menu.... Very disappointing food and service. It took more than 15 minutes to bring our drink order and we had to remind them to bring it.

Ordering the food was.... Good food but simple taco at ten times normal price is outlandish.  Margarita for 13 euros total ripoff. Get slightly better pricing and I am happy to return.

name: The Irish Temple
address: Avenida De Moratalaz, 123, 28030 Madrid, Spain

name: El Fogón de Trifón
address: Calle de Ayala, 144, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review: Came here because I saw the network TV series "From Spain with Love" with Annie Sibonney where she introduced some of the specialties of the restaurants.... Service was great! We did not make reservations and came right when it opened. The front said they would not be able to accommodate us but one of the.... amazing restaurant, great food and a lovely atmosphere.Really worth a visit!.

name: La Cuchara
address: Calle del Conde de Peñalver, 82, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review: Found this restaurant on Yelp! and tried it with a friend 3 months ago. Loved the fact that i could save a table on their website since I don't speak.... This Venezuelan place is sooooo good. One of the waiters used to live in Brooklyn and is super helpful with non Spanish speaking people. Empanadas de cazón.... Cool place with a cool atmosphere. Randomly just walked in cause it looked cute and it had the best sangria I have ever had..

name: Betelu
address: Calle de Florencio Llorente, 27, 28027 Madrid, Spain
review: We came because of the reviews and we wanted seafood.  The restaurant had nothing but fish... not the same a seafood.  A large menu but only a few items.... Make reservations before you go!!!! This place was recommended to me by a coworker from Spain. This is a hidden gem! They are best known for their fish. For.... Best fish in town cooked in simple and tasty Navarran style. Very good wine list. Family owned and managed. Tasty home made desserts..

name: Hannover
address: Calle de la Marroquina, 34, 28030 Madrid, Spain
review:
This is a great place to hang out on a warm evening. Each caña comes with a tapa, and the menu selection is great.
Be sure to get here earlier in the....

name: Bueybistro
address: Calle General Pardiñas 10, 28001 Madrid, Spain

name: Entre Cáceres y Badajoz
address: Calle de Don Ramón de la Cruz, 109, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review:
I guess I forgot to review this place from my visit way back in 2015.

It was awesome, duh.

So I'm gonna go again!. Another great place to eat in the Salamanca neighborhood of Madrid, not far from the bullring. Melt in your mouth food and decent prices and a wonderful.... Great place if you want some bites with a round of drinks. We came in an ordered one Tinto (red wine) and two beers for €8.80 which came with "free" tapas....

name: Bacchvs
address: Avenida de Moratalaz, 141, 28030 Madrid, Spain

name: Levél
address: Avenida de Menéndez Pelayo, 61, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review:
Very good experience and friendly service.

We ordered the falafel, lasagna and crepes for dinner and then had the carrot cake and strawberry kisses for.... Wow is all I can say.  This place is amazing.  The food is innovative and what I would consider high cuisine.  I hope this restaurant becomes the standard.... A clean, modern, attractive decor; very helpful waiter (thanks Pablo), and exquisite, delicious food.  Whether you are vegetarian or not, you'll love their....

name: Couzapin
address: Calle de Menorca, 33, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review: This is an Asturian restaurant with fresh products from the north. When you enter beefier reaching the bar there are some tables for clients. Then you're.... Came here for dinner because I was really craving something and this was nearby. I ordered the croquetas con jamon y patatas cabrales. The croquetas were.... We had the best lunch at this Asturian restaurant. It's away from the usual tourist haunts, and the staff didn't speak much English, but the menu did offer....

name: Grosso Napoletano
address: Calle de Hermosilla, 85, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review: Went there twice. The pizza was cooked poorly basically the cheese was raw on top of the pizza and the staff was so rude. Found a much better place around.... I had been craving pizza for days and i wish I'd found this place sooner so that I could go back again before I head back home from my trip. I had the 4.... Fantastic Italian food.. made with love with Iralian ingredients! Easy, short menu! Great place to go! Make your reservation!!.

name: Laredo
address: Calle del Doctor Castelo, 30, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review: This place is BUSY and bustling! We sat at the bar area, nabbed a bottle or rose and let the night unfold. We had plenty of tapas and some of the best steak.... This place is awesome... very good food and great service.... we had several appetizers and several fish plates as main course... the tortilla with.... This is an original restaurant and bar with a great and unique style and menu, and a faithful clientele. It serves mostly Cantabrian cuisine. With....

name: El Pescador
address: Calle Jose Ortega y Gasset, 75, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review:
RELIABLE OCEAN EATERY
This establishments truly reliable. This is one of the world best best destination of oceanic ingredients.it is run and owned by.... Muy buenos pescados y mariscos.
Los meseros con mucha experiencia.
Recomendado
Felicidades!!. Its on my top 3 sea food restaurants in Spain. Super fresh and amazing flavors. Simply cooked with oil and salt.... all is good. Oysters Napoleon, Cigalas,....

name: La Gaditana
address: Calle de la Fuente del Berro, 23, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review:
Seriously people run, don't walk to this place!! Honestly such great food and prices. 

Visiting in Madrid, my cousin suggested this place and boy oh boy am....

name: Las Costillas
address: Calle de Tajos Altos, 12, 28053 Madrid, Spain

name: Viena Capellanes
address: Calle de Alcalá, 127, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review:
The place is beautiful, the decoration is amazing and the wood finish are delightful. 

This place transports you to the 1800s with a feel of a bakery that.... They have a wonderful selection of delicious pastries. We chose six different items and all were great. The service was also first rate.. Had breakfast today. Loved the food and service. Great little place. They have lots of pastries. Would definitely go again..

name: Los Girasoles
address: Calle de Don Ramón de la Cruz, 48, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review: American in Madrid LOVED the atmosphere and the quality of the food. Visited 3x during my trip and cannot wait to go back. Great Mexican food in Spain.. Pretty good Mexican restaurant in the Salamanca neighborhood. And they have Modelo on tap.  Had the tacos al pastor and it was pretty good. Guacamole wasn't....

name: La Catapa
address: Calle de Menorca, 14, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review:
If you're looking for something a little different than the typical Spanish tapas, this is a great place and full of locals. If you want to sit at an actual.... As a tourist in Spain, I spent a couple of paid calls to call La Catapa by Skype to reserve a table for 6.

The woman who picked up my calls gave me.... A local recommended this place to me. I'm so glad I tried it! The waiters were friendly and patient with my broken Spanish, and the food was amazing.

The....

name: Sabor Norteño
address: Calle Vázquez de Mella, 37, 28017 Madrid, Spain
review: Kind of a hidden gem in an unassuming neighbourhood with an amazing staff. Really amazing vibes and the food was very satisfying.

name: La Tagliatella
address: Avenida Felipe II, 17, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review: So delicious and superior waitstaff! So happy with our time here!! Delicioso! Such a wonderful evening!. I would really give this place a 3.5.  Its your classic Italian restaurant with a white cloth and booth table. Which is great if you are looking for.... Spectacular, food incredible Giancarlo, the best waitress, try risotto mate, all pasta. Service the best.

name: La Raquetista
address: Calle Dr. Castelo, 19, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review:
We came here a couple years ago but this restaurant stood out so much that I feel compelled to write this review! 

Even as my first ever meal in Spain,.... Very good food, lovely service. A newcomer in the Barrio Ibiza and a warmly welcome one!.

name: Sin Reservas
address: Calle de Lope de Rueda, 49, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review:
Let me tell you a story of a lovely evening.  You pick up your lady after a long day at work.  You go for a long walk in the huge Ritero park enjoying the.... Lovely restaurant!
Knowledgeable employees about wine and cheeses.
Upscale service and food quality..

name: A'Conchiña
description: Tapas Bars Tapas/Small Plates Dive Bars
address: Calle de Benidorm, 32, 28017 Madrid, Spain
review: Food and trash all over bar food looked ok but the food on floor created uneasiness and concern about possibly getting sick.

name: Estrella
address: Calle Hacienda de Pavones, 225, 28030 Madrid, Spain

name: Cazorla
address: Calle del General Pardiñas, 80, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review: This awesome little place was just down the street from where I'm staying on holiday! They have a great selection of local food and they aren't stuffing.... Great authentic Spanish food! If you are looking for some classic dishes check out one of the Cazorla locations!. This is one of my favorite haunts from the days when I lived in Madrid. It's a little neighborhood place that has a nice selection of wine and beer, and....

name: El Paraíso del Desierto
address: Calle del Dr. Esquerdo, 140, 28007 Madrid, Spain

name: Vinos de Bellota
address: Calle de Antonio Acuña, 27, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review: This was recommended to me and I was glad I went. As my first time in Madrid, I wanted to try what madrid can offer and this place does not disappoint. Love.... Excellent!  The chef and his team are adorable; the food is wonderful and creative.  Uniquely delicious.  Highly recommended.. The food was good, and it came out it a timely manner.  I would say the service was ok, but I did have to get up to look for our server twice to make....

name: Taberna Búlgara
address: Avenida Peña Prieta, 82, 28038 Madrid, Spain
review: Outstanding good food and very cheap, all food is nearly done on the grill and meat is just delicious and you don't have to wait long time. Atmosphere is....

name: Gredos
address: Calle del Arroyo Belincoso, 12, 28030 Madrid, Spain

name: Ayala Japón
address: Calle de Ayala, 67, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review:
Surprisingly good Japanese fare in the heart of the city.

Service is super attentive and everything tastes fresh. I have a problem with seaweed in this....

name: El Sol de la Lonja
address: Calle de la Marroquina, 20, 28030 Madrid, Spain

name: Fogg Bar Birras & Butis
address: Calle Juan de Urbieta, 12, 28007 Madrid, Spain

name: El Chorrón
address: Calle del Doctor Gómez Ulla, 12, 28028 Madrid, Spain
review: I was looking for a place to eat tapas and some grilled food. And this place hit the spot. It was around 5:30 pm so not too many people, which means better....

name: Pazo Coruña
address: Calle de Pío Baroja, 6, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review: A dependable, traditional restaurant with professional, European-style service, excellent food, cocktails and a nice wine list. Their specialties are.... Excellent food and ambiance. Our chef friend from Barcelona recommended this place. We were very happy with the food. The staff was incredibly friendly and....
